website_summaries.verdict: Belkin's iPad 2- and third-gen-iPad-friendly YourType Folio + Keyboard case takes a solid if uninspired folio case design and adds a keyboard for one of the better protective solutions around.
pros: The Belkin YourType Folio + Keyboard has a removable Bluetooth keyboard and offers solid folio-style case protection in one package, and can be flexibly adjusted
cons: The folio case function is better than other keyboard cases, but still isn't good enough to beat top-notch stand-alone folio cases
The Velcro-attached keyboard can feel clunky to set up

customer_reviews.title: case is great and convenient
customer_reviews.text: case is great and convenient. You are able to remove the keyboard from the case when your not using it. Also, the case covers the screen preventing any scratches on t he screen. The only problem I have experienced is that the keyboard lags a little bit. When you are typing something the keys you press sometimes don't show up on the screen until 15 seconds after. However, that is only sometimes but it is enough to be noticeable. Overall you can't go wrong with belkin and this case.
customer_reviews.author: Randall Martin

customer_reviews.title: Very bulky and doesn't stand up very well
